resources.string:
Camera Permission Request
Our app requires access to your device\'s camera to enable you to take pictures directly within the app. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your data. The camera will only be used for taking pictures and not for any other purpose.
Thank you for trusting us!

Notification Permission Request
Our app needs permission to send you task-related notifications. These will help you stay on top of deadlines, receive task reminders, and get progress updates. You can manage your notification preferences anytime in the app settings.
Thank you!

Alarm Permission Request
Our app needs permission to set alarms for you. This will help you stay on schedule and never miss important events or deadlines. You can manage your alarm settings anytime in the app.
Thank you!
